A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Director was allowed to abandon key story arcs that defined the escence of Star Wars. Extremely disappointed that fundamental expectations for the saga were deliberately ignored or even reversed. I understand why critics love to praise and even reward breaking the mold\, but the approach to this particular film makes a mockery of of those things that were endearing to Star Wars. Its unfortunate that hard-core fans would shun the new Solo movie in retaliation\, especially when Ron Howard did such a decent job. Hey Disney\, take a hard look at Rogue One. It worked.
